channel.title: Apology on behalf of me, chaos and krack
channel.description: We have come to the decision of stopping trolling, we have understood our ways wasn't good and it caused too much hastle for the good moderators of MSCP. We will now stop and be somewhat serious about our posting and will not spam/troll these forums anymore. Consider this a apology for all that we've done, but remember we will cease these activities.

item.title: Apology on behalf of me, chaos and krack
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Proper warning’s handed out. You have all had it to easy on you and I’m fucking tired of your ‘elitism’. None of you are any smarter then the rest of us yet you are treated like fucking kings. Enjoy the mutes, I might make it longer in the future.

Read full topic
item.source: Apology on behalf of me, chaos and krack

item.title: Apology on behalf of me, chaos and krack
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Not really a need to notify the community on your “change” with a topic, you can do so by actually changing your attitude in your posts.

Read full topic
item.source: Apology on behalf of me, chaos and krack
